sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function NavigationBarMobile() { const [menu, setMenu] = useState(false); const [topics, setTopics] = useState(false); const [sources, setSources] = useState(false); const [languages, setLanguages] = useState(false); return (
{ setMenu(menu ? false : true); }} >
{menu ? (
setTopics(topics ? false : true)} > Topics
{topics ? (

Health

Science

Sports

Entertainment

Business

Technology

) : null}
setSources(sources ? false : true)} > Sources
{sources ? (
CNN Time Reuters BBC-NEWS ESPN
) : null}
setLanguages(languages ? false : true)} > Languages
{languages ? (
English Spanish Russian German Arabic Italian
) : null}
) : null}
); }
